COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: [Fal] “Alright, see you tomorrow. It's a Saturday, but,
same time same place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. See you then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0
STRING: Besides the days that she had to work, we spent all day
every day rehearsing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6
STRING: I went to school at ten o'clock in the morning, ate the
lunches that she packed for us, and played my Fortelle
until it became dark.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc
STRING: The passage of time was strangely fast, and before I
knew it, one day was over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2
STRING: However, on days that Fal had work, I ended up having
time on my hands in the afternoons.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208
STRING: I had no problems with just going home, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a
STRING: [Torta] “Chris, what are you doing just standing there...?
What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240
STRING: I heard a voice call to me from behind suddenly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24c
STRING: Upon turning about, I saw it was Torta, walking over
from the direction of the First Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x280
STRING: [Chris] “Torta... I'm not actually doing anything in
particular.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: [Torta] “You're about to go home?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: [Chris] “No... I haven't decided yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6
STRING: [Torta] “You know... If you keep standing around like
that, you'll catch a cold?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31e
STRING: Anyway, why don't we go inside for now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x340
STRING: I hadn't spoken to Torta for a while now, so it might be
nice for a change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356
STRING: I followed on behind Torta, who was heading for the
Second Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0
STRING: I was thinking that she was perhaps going to go into
one of the practice rooms, but she went directly into
the cafeteria, without the faintest hesitation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Chris] “Don't you usually have practice at this time of
day?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f0
STRING: [Torta] “I was thinking of calling it a day. I just had one
of my teachers watch me sing, so I'm kind of tired now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x410
STRING: [Chris] “So you were just coming back from that, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42e
STRING: [Torta] “Are you hungry, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x444
STRING: [Chris] “Nah, I've already eaten.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x476
STRING: [Torta] “I don't think I saw you here in the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a4
STRING: Did you eat somewhere else?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ba
STRING: [Chris] “...In the practice room, actually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d0
STRING: I told Torta about everything that had been going on
recently, as it was also a good opportunity to tell her
about Fal, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e6
STRING: Torta suggested we get something to drink, ordering a
cioccolata calda at the counter and then sipping from it
happily upon returning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e
STRING: [Torta] “And so, what was that about the practice
room?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x534
STRING: [Chris] “Actually... It's exactly what it sounds like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54a
STRING: I told Torta about how we have been eating the
sandwiches and packed lunches that Fal makes for us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x560
STRING: It wasn't really something I should be saying out aloud,
but it wasn't something that I needed to keep from
Torta either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57e
STRING: [Torta] “But... You're not supposed to be eating in
there, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x594
STRING: [Chris] “No, we definitely aren't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b2
STRING: [Torta] “You'd be in serious trouble if you got caught...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c8
STRING: [Chris] “That's the thing, the teachers don't say anything
even if they see us. It's actually happened a couple of
times now, but they just exchange a few words and
that's it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fa
STRING: [Torta] “Are you kidding?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x610
STRING: [Chris] “Fal said that she got a kind of unofficial okay
from the teachers when she straight up asked them to
allow her, saying that she didn't want to waste any time
she could have spent practicing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x642
STRING: [Torta] “She's that kind of person?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x658
STRING: [Chris] “Seems that way. I have to say my impression of
her has changed a bit since then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x678
STRING: Saying that, I realized that it's only been a month and a
half so far.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68e
STRING: The time we spent practicing together and eating
together had increased, and now it felt completely
normal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: To distance myself from Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b0
STRING: That excuse was now a thing of the past.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c4
STRING: [Torta] “You two get along well, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6da
STRING: [Chris] “Well, we are partners after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f8
STRING: [Torta] “Do you remember what you said before?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70e
STRING: [Chris] “...I said something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72c
STRING: [Torta] “...It doesn't matter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x742
STRING: She laughed almost as if she was sighing, and then
continued to enjoy her cioccolata.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x760
STRING: [Torta] “Are you going to practice after this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x776
STRING: [Chris] “Fal has to work, so I'm done for the day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x794
STRING: [Torta] “She still has her part time job?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7aa
STRING: [Chris] “Apparently, and up until she graduates, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c8
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7de
STRING: Even if she asked me why Fal was still working, I myself
didn't know the answer either, so I wouldn't have been
able to answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f4
STRING: However, Torta didn't ask any further questions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x808
STRING: [Torta] “So, how is everything going anyway?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81e
STRING: [Chris] “Hm? Oh, not bad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83c
STRING: [Torta] “If you put it that way, Chris, I guess that means
you're somewhat confident.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85c
STRING: [Chris] “Ms. Cordell said something along the same
lines, but... Do I always seem that pessimistic?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x884
STRING: [Torta] “No, no, that's not what I meant. But, I just can't
imagine you brimming with confidence, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a4
STRING: [Chris] “That's true, even I can't imagine that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c2
STRING: [Torta] “It's more characteristic of you to say ‘kind of’ or
‘somewhat,’ something like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e2
STRING: [Chris] “...Not really a characteristic to be proud of.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x900
STRING: [Torta] “Aha-ha. If you're not happy about it, you could
always make an effort to change?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x916
STRING: [Chris] “I think I'd be even less happy about that
prospect.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x934
STRING: [Torta] “I thought as much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94a
STRING: Torta responded immediately, as if she had already
known what I was going to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x960
STRING: Still, it wasn't that she was being mean, it was the
comfortable kind of conversation we could only have
because we knew each other so well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x976
STRING: And then, I remembered another certain someone who
wasn't here, and went a little quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98c
STRING: The sweet smell of chocolate, and the chuckling of a
voice I knew well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x998
STRING: If I closed my eyes, I felt like I could recall various old
memories in an instant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ae
STRING: But, instead I faced straight ahead, and continued
talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ba
STRING: [Chris] “How about you, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d8
STRING: [Torta] “No problems here. My recital is a solo
performance, so I can do things at my own pace, which
makes it easier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f8
STRING: [Chris] “Didn't you have to do an ensemble with a piano,
or something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa16
STRING: [Torta] “That's something else entirely. It's different to
having a partner like Fortelle players have to. The
singing is the only thing they focus on, the piano doesn't
get judged.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa40
STRING: [Chris] “Huh, that sounds easy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5e
STRING: [Torta] “Excuse me, do you really...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa74
STRING: [Chris] “I'm joking! I know that doing things solo is
difficult in its own way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9c
STRING: [Torta] “Really? Do you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab2
STRING: [Chris] “You're the one who said it was easier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad0
STRING: [Torta] “I'm allowed to say that. You're not, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae6
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafc
STRING: I was unable to keep the somewhat nostalgic feelings
at bay, when someone else called to me from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb28
STRING: [Asino] “Well this is rare, seeing the two of you together
like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3e
STRING: [Chris] “...I guess that's true, recently.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb82
STRING: Commenting like this, Asino took a seat next to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb96
STRING: [Torta] “Hello.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb4
STRING: [Asino] “Hi.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbca
STRING: [Chris] “Time for lunch, Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe8
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah. Bit of a late one, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfe
STRING: Stabbing his fork into the pasta on his tray and
disinterestedly mixing it about, Asino continued on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1c
STRING: [Asino] “You've finished practicing for today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc32
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, my partner has to work.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc64
STRING: [Asino] “And so that's why you're sitting around chatting
to Tortinita, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7a
STRING: [Chris] “...Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc98
STRING: [Torta] “What about it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcca
STRING: [Asino] “Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce0
STRING: [Chris] “Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfe
STRING: [Asino] “Really, it's nothing. Sorry, I'm feeling a bit
irritated because I still haven't found a partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1e
STRING: [Chris] “What, still...? Is that going to be okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3c
STRING: [Asino] “I'll be fine. I have some potentials, after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd52
STRING: [Chris] “I know that. I was talking about rehearsing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd84
STRING: [Asino] “It doesn't really matter who I chose as my
partner. We're going to be performing a song that I
wrote myself, so it's all good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda4
STRING: [Chris] “There's a bit more to it than that. When you
have a partner you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde0
STRING: [Torta] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf6
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe28
STRING: [Torta] “It's okay, Asino gets it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5a
STRING: [Asino] “Exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe70
STRING: [Chris] “...I hope so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe86
STRING: I had always wondered about this, but I had the feeling
that these two weren't capable of getting along.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9c
STRING: Asino almost never joined the conversation when I was
with Torta like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb2
STRING: And vice versa, Torta never spoke to me when I was
with Asino, unless she absolutely had to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec8
STRING: Asino also never called her by her nickname, Torta, but
instead always used her full name, Tortinita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xede
STRING: But despite all that, they sometimes talked naturally
about things I didn't understand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf10
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I'm going to go back to practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf26
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf58
STRING: [Torta] “It seems you're working hard, Chris. Makes me
feel like I should practice a little more too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf78
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, okay. But try not to overdo it if you're
feeling tired.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa0
STRING: [Torta] “I'll follow your example there, don't worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb6
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd4
STRING: [Torta] “See you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1008
STRING: Torta said a brief goodbye to Asino, and then walked
off in the direction of the practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101e
STRING: On the other hand, Asino just continued to nonchalantly
eat his meal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1034
STRING: [Chris] “Do you have rehearsals again after this, Asino?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1052
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah, with one of my potential partners.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1068
STRING: [Chris] “Oh wow, you actually have your act together.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109a
STRING: [Asino] “Didn't we just establish that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b0
STRING: Sounding unimpressed as he spoke, he then finally
opened up a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d8
STRING: [Asino] “Was I interrupting?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ee
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110c
STRING: [Asino] “You and Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1122
STRING: [Chris] “As if. There's nothing going on there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: [Asino] “You don't like her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1156
STRING: [Chris] “Oh no, I like her too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1188
STRING: [Asino] “Too, you say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119e
STRING: [Chris] “In the same way that I like you, Asino.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d0
STRING: [Asino] “But, you know, she might not be thinking in the
same way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: [Chris] “Of course she does. My relationship with Torta
only exists because of Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120e
STRING: [Asino] “That's how it works?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1224
STRING: [Chris] “Pretty much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1256
STRING: [Asino] “So, are things going well with the all important
Arietta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126c
STRING: [Chris] “That's another weird thing to ask about...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128a
STRING: [Asino] “I'm just concerned, as a friend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: I mean, she probably wasn't expecting you to partner
up with a girl that isn't Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d8
STRING: [Chris] “Probably not. She wrote as much in one of her
letters. But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130a
STRING: [Asino] “But?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1320
STRING: [Chris] “She also wrote for me to do as I please.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1352
STRING: [Asino] “She's given up on you...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1368
STRING: [Chris] “Nah... At least, I don't think she has.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1386
STRING: [Asino] “You're so negative. You guys have been
together for three years, haven't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x139c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ce
STRING: [Asino] “In that case, you just have to wait a little
longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e4
STRING: [Chris] “I know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fa
STRING: Had I ever spoken to Asino about Arie like this before?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1410
STRING: I never wanted to gush about my personal life, so I
always kept it short and talked about her only when I
was asked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1426
STRING: I doubted that he had just become interested now after
all this time, but in any case it seemed that he was
concerned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1444
STRING: [Asino] “But anyway, be nice to her, yeah?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145a
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah, I will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1470
STRING: He said the same kind of things again, and I started to
feel a little uneasy towards the change in Asino's
attitude.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1486
STRING: I had some things on my mind, and Asino continued
eating his lunch in a way that seemed like he was deep
in thought too, so neither of us said any more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a6
STRING: Taking the sound of Asino placing his fork on his plate
as an opportunity, we both got up to leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14bc
STRING: I was going to go home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c8
STRING: Asino was going to go back to practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14dc
STRING: [Asino] “Okay, see you around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f2
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150a
STRING: Was he...worried about me?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1516
STRING: I felt happy that he was concerned about me, but at the
same time I felt a slight burden, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152c
STRING: But, appreciating the fact that I had friends who talk to
me like this, I left the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157a
STRING: I suddenly recalled what happened the day before
yesterday, and decided to drop by Fal's trattoria one
more time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1590
STRING: Perhaps she went home comparatively early last time,
as I was unable to see her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a6
STRING: I should have asked her before she left, but since we
were absorbed in our rehearsals, it probably would
have been hard for her to recall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c6
STRING: I went to the trattoria at about the same time as the
day before yesterday, but when I tried to open the
door, someone opened it from the inside instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15dc
STRING: I tried to make way, thinking it was a customer leaving
the trattoria, but before I could, she let out an
exclamation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1616
STRING: [Fal] “Chris!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162c
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164a
STRING: [Fal] “...What's going on? Are you here for dinner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1660
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, it was kind of impulsive but I decided to
grab something to eat. Did you just finish your shift?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169c
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b2
STRING: [Chris] “Would you like to join me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e4
STRING: [Fal] “Ah... Sorry, I have to meet someone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fa
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, okay. In that case don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172c
STRING: [Fal] “I'm sorry. If I had known earlier, I would have been
able to eat with you, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174c
STRING: [Chris] “Nah, it's okay. Really, I only thought of coming
by just now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176a
STRING: [Fal] “Really? In that case, let me know in advance next
time. We can share a meal, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178a
STRING: [Chris] “Sure. Ah... So, you're free from this time of day,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c6
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, this works for me. Why do you ask?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17dc
STRING: [Chris] “I came by and had dinner the day before
yesterday, but I didn't get to see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1818
STRING: [Fal] “Ahh... I ended up working late that day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1838
STRING: [Chris] “...They're still working you hard as always, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186a
STRING: [Fal] “But I had my shifts shortened, so it's really nothing
I can't handle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188a
STRING: [Chris] “Right. Ah... Weren't you supposed to be
meeting someone?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a0
STRING: Watching Fal peek at the end of the street a number of
times during our conversation reminded me of what she
said when she first came out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d2
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, yes. Sorry, I need to rush. I'll see you
tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e8
STRING: [Chris] “See you then... Wait, that's the second time
we've done this today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191a
STRING: [Fal] “...It is? Anyway, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x193a
STRING: She must have really been in a rush, as she ran a little as
she left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1950
STRING: Watching her leave, I kind of lost my interest in eating
at Copert, and decided to walk home instead.
